info.title: Beckn Gateway API
info.description: API Spec for Final Mile Delivery

requestBody.description: BAP searches for nearby FMD Services

post.description: Fetch catalog of a service based on filters
Select the preferred service. This also allows selection of items from the catalog. Equivalent to selecting a service and adding items to cart.

domain_level_attrs.description: These contain domain level filtering attributes like taxonomies, standards etc. Might not relevant for every domain. Can be extended on mutual agreement between network participants and Beckn Foundation

post.description: Confirm a Service. At this stage the FMD Planner should be able to agree on the quoted price and should be able to create an order to block the service (This may lead to searching for FMD Agents, Driver assignment) should be able to see acceptance / rejection of the order along with a payment prompt
Fetch the status of a Service
Checkout from a service. Using this action, the FMD Payer should be able to send proof of payment to the FMD service
Track an item during an active service
Fetch the status of a Service
Acknowledge the checkout of a service and send invoice of the FMD service
Returns updated service with updated runtime object
